articles.author: Harriet Clarfelt
articles.title: Investors warm to riskiest US corporate debt - Financial Times
articles.description: Lowest-rated junk bonds benefit from ‘soft landing’ hopes for world’s biggest economy
articles.content:
Investors are warming to the riskiest US corporate debt, as optimism about the state of the worlds biggest economy narrows the gulf between the top and bottom rungs of the $1.35tn junk bond market.
… [+2297 chars]
